newsitem.title: UK: NWE straight-run flat, Russian said sold into barges.
newsitem.headline: NWE straight-run flat, Russian said sold into barges.

text.p: Low sulphur straight-run was little changed on Tuesday, with many sellers not talking September barrels while Russian high sulphur material was reported sold steady into the barge market.

One seller said bids and offers were notionally at $106 and $109 respectively for low sulphur material while another seller said the best bid he heard was at $108 while his offer price was unchanged at $113 fob.
"The market was quiet today. If anything, the levels should be a little higher with crude up," one trader said.
